text: Azimut Holding is an Italian asset management company, based in Milan, Italy, with branches in Australia, Brazil, Chile, China, Egypt, Ireland, Luxembourg, Mexico, Monaco, Singapore, Switzerland, Taiwan, Turkey, United Arab Emirates and the United States. Traded on the Borsa Italiana, the company is specialized in investment management aimed at private and institutional clients. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Companies listed on the Borsa Italiana Category:Companies based in Milan Category:Financial services companies established in 1988 Category:Investment management companies of Italy
title: Azimut Holding
